answers.answer: Depending on your body weight pre-pregnancy and number of babies a good resonable amount will be 25-35lbs. I will say don't worry about weight, just make sure to drink lots of water, eat a healthy snack and meal and to engage  in light physical exercise. Some  woman may gain weight more than  others which can be due to medical reasons ( like diabetes..etc)  or some may retain water weight.

question: About How Many Pounds Are U Supposed To Gain Through Out Your Whole Pregnancy?
title: weight??
